use` sqllogicaldw;

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Pa$$w0rdPa$$w0rd'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [st]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
     SECRET = '?sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2023-06-13T06:33:08Z&st=2022-06-12T22:33:08Z&spr=https&sig=0roZjFqb0NBR%2F2LnYBalRLsn06ie6tpaFVxkwZSpWfo%3D';
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE EmployeeSource
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://adls5005.dfs.core.windows.net/stage/employee',
          CREDENTIAL = st
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
      FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
      STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
      FIRST_ROW = 2,
      USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
      ENCODING = 'UTF8' )
);
GO

CREATE SCHEMA LDW authorization dbo;

--creates a scoped credential which uses Active Directory to authenticate with the Azure Storage account
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SynapseUserIdentity 
WITH IDENTITY = 'User Identity';

--and finally sets the collation of the database to support UTF-8 data.
ALTER DATABASE sqllogicaldw COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;
